content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I first saw it to the west just a dark object  going very slow  i was outside barbecuing i went inside to tell my friend and girlfriend they came out and we watched it go by almost right above us a little south of us i think it may have been military since at the time van nuys air force base was next to the airport and it was just west of the base on strathern st.It traveled very slow was silent was just dark and was only visible because of the lights from northridge hospital that reflected off it. it took minutes to go by, made no sound. but that was in 93' and now 21 years later still no planes like that. so i think i saw something secret. maybe not extraterrestrial or de mensional .The object continued to travel west until we lost sight of it. because it was so low the trees and houses got in the way.
content.summary: East to west about 5 miles an hour dark arrow shaped triangle no lights just reflected light from hospital lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
June 29, 2014
at approximately 11:00pm i took our dog out to go potty. my house faces to the west. i'm standing on the patio in the back of the house. the sky was very dark with storm clouds. to the north i saw flashes of lightening. as i was turning north to face the lightening, i saw going over my house, heading north over the neighbors house a cluster of flickering and flashing lights in a triangular pattern, (see attached simulated photo). the first triangular cluster was followed by an identical second triangular cluster. i ran to the back door and yelled for my wife. she came out and witnessed the second lights. she was carrying her tablet. i grabbed the tablet, fumbled with trying to find the camera function then took several shots, (see attached photos). i'm guessing they were 300 to 500 feet up, traveling north at 100 mph and had no sound what so ever.
content.summary: I saw heading north over neighborhood a cluster of lights in a triangular pattern followed by a second  cluster. i took several pictures.

content.detailedDescription: My girl friend was outside on front porch at about 10:07 tonight and yelled for me to come look and i went out back, cause it flow over the trees in the front so i ran to the back to see the rest of what i could of it .. there looked like there was a craft made of lights in front of the triangle craft flying erratically  but still flying just in front of the triangle craft at the same speed even though it was up down, side to side, and back and forth, then about 2 minutes later i went out on the front to see if there was any more action and i see this triangle shape three white lights and a pulsating red light beautiful glowing pulsating red  i watched it with my binoculars till it went out of sight. could not make out any solid material like metal the 2 triangles was the best seen, they had very bright lights and very bright pulsating red lights i have ever seen,the bright white lights stayed on constantly with no pulsating it was a very clear type of light. then i see some what looked like military jets, looked like they was tracking them there light was nothing like the light on the ufos at all and very much smaller in size ufos looked to be much bigger, i am thinking 45 to 50% bigger than jets and the lights was massive, compared to the jets lights i just wonder if people in montpelier seen them. they was bright enough to see even with street lights on.
content.summary: Two triangle shaped ufos over tonight white lights was flying in  front of the first triangle flying erratically

content.detailedDescription:
If you've seen ufos so often that it has become a habit for you to diligently scan the skies every time you're outdoors, you've probably seen one of these ufos and then promptly talked yourself out of acknowledging it. i believe these things deserve to be dubbed "shooters".  i suspect these are the things i think i've glimpsed at times, but the visuals on them are so brief (as in fractions of a second) i end up doubting i've seen anything at all.  looking at them you can see they are quite small. just imagine if their usual conduct is to zip across the sky at incredible speeds. you can see how easy it would be to dismiss them as a sighting under such circumstances. obviously this is just conjecture on my part, but i feel this is also a high probability scenario. so if you've got an elderly relative that's been insisting they've been seeing little bitty ufos zinging across the sky, you can quit patting them on the shoulder and telling them, "we're going to find you a nice place to stay where you won't have to think about things anymore". 
the sky photo was taken on june 11 2014, at about 12:15 pm. the cross walk photo was taken on june 14 2014, at about 9:37 am.
content.summary: Small and fast ufos i call shooters

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in p.G county maryland with about 4-5 people in the car and one of the occupants said look a ufo ! we looked up and there was a huge triangular object hovering over a small building at about the height of a half mile up or so. the size of the object was about the size of a football field. very very big and hovered and made no sound at all and had a few red lights that would blink every few seconds. it was black in color and had no windows and a pattern on the bottom that looked the trails that worms leave in wood. we all saw it and were at a stop light and there were some cars behind us that must have seen it too. it was too big to miss but was silent so was very strange. we all just sat there looking in amazement of how such a huge object can just float in the air like that. afterwards we drove away for some odd reason. i don't know why i didn't stay to watch more. we all still talk about the sighting to this day and wish we had a camera or something. it was truly remarkable how big it was and how low it was. this has been on my mind for many years now to find out what exactly i saw. all i know is it did not look like nothing i have seen on earth!
content.summary: Triangular object hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of my apartment on la cienega blvd taking pictures of the moon. the moon was supposed to be almost full and at its closest point to the earth in its orbit. i took four pictures. the first two i was zoomed in, the second two i was zoomed out at full. the photos were taken with an iphone 4s. i didn't notice the object when i originally took the pictures. i was focused on looking at the moon. when i uploaded the pictures to my mac to post them to facebook i noticed a small starlike object in the frame. as i looked through the pictures i noticed that it was moving through the frames slowly. one it was moving to the left and in the other it moved to the right. in the last picture you can barely see its motion (a small trail, perhaps light moving across the frame and being blurred by the slow shutter speed). in west la/culver city at that time of the year, low clouds move in from the ocean every night. we call it june gloom. the clouds, which you can see are very low, so the object must be below it. planes flying out of lax heading east fly over my apartment all the time, but they are so low and loud that you can see them (livery and paint scheme, number of engines, model of plane, running lights, etc.). this object has no resemblence to any of the boeings or airbus or dcs that commonly fly over. this is very similar to daytime objects i have seen many times before in the past: starlike objects moving in strange directions. i have attached the photos in the order i took them.
content.summary: Starlike object captured on camera while shooting the moon

content.detailedDescription:
my family and i were on vacation at north myrtle beach on wednesday, june 25th.  we were on the 14th floor at the bay watch resort when my grandson told me he saw a strange orange light in the sky. this was about 10:45p.M. 6 members of the family watched up to 15 minutes of the lights in the sky going off and on like turning off a light bulb. there about 12 of them in a straight line at different times.  they were about a mile off the beach and they were spaced about a half mile apart.  there was a strong wind blowing and these objects did not move.  they were about 45 degrees in the sky.  the sky was partially cloudy. the lights only stayed on for about 3 to 5 seconds.  the last light went off when a helicopter approached the area. we had binoculars and cameras with us but we could not focus on the lights, as to the short duration they appeared.
  i have been a long time ufo researcher and i feel that this particular sighting needs reported.  i must say that i feet good that i had my family with me so they could observe something very strange.
content.summary: Family of 6 observed up to 12 orange colored lights in a straight line over ocean for up to 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photographs of the napoleonic battlefield at waterloo, belgium in may of 2006.  although i didn't see anything unusual at the time, i was surprised to discover three black objects hovering in the shape of a triangle in one of the pictures (they are visible in the center left).  knowing the reputation belgium has for black triangle sightings, i decided to submit the photo here.  there were no birds or aircraft in the area that day.
content.summary: Three black objects/triangle photographed in belgium

content.detailedDescription:
On march 31, 2012 at 6:01:01 pm, i was shooting some photographs outside of the sam houston race track for a high school reunion. i shot 3 photos of the race track sign from 3 different angles and then went inside the race track hall and attended the reunion function.

one year later i was going through these photos for inclusion in a shutterfly photo book when i noticed something on one of the outside photos that looked like it could have been a spec of dust on my lens. when i enlarged the photo, i found something that looked like a disc or cigar-shaped object in the photo above the race track park sign.

i'm not sure if it is a ufo which is why i'm submitting to you for inspection.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object observed above racetrack sign.

content.detailedDescription:
My family an i, joined a big family reunion, with a lot of members of it.
the hole day was of joy, laughin, and a beautiful picnic day in my uncle������s farm.
located in "pajas blancas", at the very city limits of montevideo, know it as "montevideo rural", a big and large place full of "chacras", small farms, most of them were made by the inmigrants from europe(italy, portugal, rusia,spain, etc.)
so, as i said, the hole day, was quite, nice and peaceful...
but the night, ... was another story...

there was  one of the worst & scariest moments of my hole life and my family members till nowdays!
at the end of the day, and in the very long hours of the night finally all the people said farewell, and good bye������s. and we start, to climb the old mercedez truck.
we started the way back.
at first, my aunt olga,my mother������s sister, said: hey! look everybody!, it������s an ufo!!!....
the crowd; inmediatly take a sight to where she pointed, in the dark sky...And..As soon as they looked, they start to laugh and saying jokes to her..
she, was wrong, and all the people (lovely)laugh on her...
what she saw, was the broadcasting antennas lights(for radios broadcastings), the big ones.
but, 10 minutes later, there she goes again...:
hey! look, everybody! it������s an ufo ! ; and god knows, we all wished she was wrong again!...
i think, everybody`s were ready to laugh on her again or so...But no one, could believe what they saw!!! :

a big light into the darkest night sky, casting light,changing colors and glowing in the middle of the fields, and farms in a very dark night.

appears from nowhere, following our truck, with almost 24 people inside, changing colors. 
it follow us for about 8-10 minutes. 
flying in a rectal line, perpendicular to our path/way, very close to us, maybe 200 meters from the truck.
until one moment, (thank god(and i������am not a believer...)), stop it������s self, and made another way, leaving a light trail behind itself.
a very scare experience for everybody! and for a child with 6 years old,... me.Who didn������t stop shaking, even at his home.
like knowing and fearing to this unknow power, to this "thing".
thanks for let me share this story that mark me since i was a child.
i wished to share this worldwide long time ago, and thanks to this site i can do it.
i have also a few stories more to tell, from people who are very close to me, and are so incredible and amazing to tell.
and please forget my english, i don������t practice the language for several years.
greetings; alejandro.

p.D.: i hope to let you a couple of stories more in the future.
content.summary: Appears from nowhere, following our truck, with 25 people inside, changing colors, for about 8-10 minutes. a very scare experience for everybody!

content.detailedDescription: On march 16, 2013 at 3:15 pm i was working in marina south east of fort lauderdale airport. when i look toward northeast look like a plane that was taking off airport runway is going to collide with brightlight approaching directly at it. when they pass each other, brightlight was going towards me and got so close that i was able to see this craft and make me speechless. metallic sphere with plasma moving around surface like old police emergency light. this craft wass about 300 yards from me and 15 to 20 feet in diameter.
content.summary: Metallic sphere 20 feet in diameter with plasma surface light

content.detailedDescription: I figured i was looking at a drone of some sort. it was an orange moving ball, about 500 ft above the treeline, i moved to get a clearer view, when it disappeared after i tried to move around a tree to see it better. it moved i guess about 1 mile in about 45 seconds before it just plain disappeared. i would like to know if anyone is flying any drones shaped like balls in my area. rural central escambia county alabama.
content.summary: I had just parked my car at my house, and got out when i saw this light about 500 ft or so above the tree near the school.

content.detailedDescription: It was just after midnight on 8/20/07 or the morning of 8/21/07. my friend and i were standing in the driveway of my home as he was leaving. he said to me what is that in the sky over there a helicopter? i said i dont know cant hear it but it is coming this way. as we watched the object come closer we could see it was making a path right over the middle of the city.  as it got closer yet we could see it had three red lights at each corner and what appeared to be a white light in the middle that would pulsate as it would move. i said to my friend thats no helicopter! it made no sound as it moved, it was in no hurry as it crossed right over the middle of the city. it was low enough that you could see it was a triangular shape black in color. i did take pic however they were lost by the photo lab, image that...Now here is the kicker, as the craft  flew off to the se two aircraft at full afterburner approached the craft and fired missiles at the craft. the craft simple stopped waited as the missiles approached it then dropped in altitude as the missiles went by it. this is the moment i knew without a doubt this craft was not of ihis planet. after dodging the missiles it shot straight out into space. not left not right not up not down straight out into space...My friend is not to open about this subject he says people just thinks he is crazy if he talks about it. i know what we saw that night and i knew at that moment we are not alone. so after watching your program about the tinley episode and that it was in the twin cities the night before it all made sense. so now you know the path it took between minneapolis and tinley.
content.summary: Tinley park ufo

content.detailedDescription: El 23 de septiembre de 2011 a las 21 30 sali a la terraza a fumar un cigarro y al mirar hacia la derecha vi unas luz naranja y lo primero que pense que eran fuegos artificiales, sigo mirando y veo otra luz naranja y otra y otra, creo que eran unas 5 esferas naranjas que pasaron delante de mi casa sin ruido ninguno y que no guardaban ninguna formacion, es decir una mas arriba de otra, otra cerca de otra...Pasaron a unos 50 metros de mi casa y a baja altura.Como pude saque el movil y comenc�� a grabar, los videos no son muy buenos porque estaba muy nervioso, pero al pasarlos al ordenador, modificando el brillo y el contraste pude ver unas luces pasando. hay una cosa extra��a en todo esto y que no se la he contado a nadie, y no se si fue producto de mi nerviosismo del momento y es que cuando empece a grabar mire el reloj y eran las 9 y 30 y despues de grabar mire y eran las 10 menos 15.No se si son imaginaciones mias o es que mire mal la hora. un tiempo despues so��e una noche que estaba en la terraza, veia las luces y una se acercaba hacia mi, empezaba a notar calor y perdia el conocimiento.Como digo no se si son imaginaciones mias o sucedio algo extra��o a parte
content.summary: Esferas anaranjadas sin ruido

content.detailedDescription: I was up couldn't sleep so i walked down stairs got some water went back to my room and looked out of my bedroom window which faces approx. 350 degrees north.  i look to the left and that's when i saw the object.  i told my wife to hurry up and look, she also was awake, then she spotted the object.  i then told her to go get our son and he saw the object.  we watched it blink between white and red white and red over and over.  i then went downstairs to get my cell phone to take a picture. i took one picture that shows the craft all white.  my son came outside and i told him to use his iphone and take a video.  by now my daughter is up and she is looking at the object. now it's been about 20 minutes or so and it slowly starts moving westerly. i is still visible but at times it went behind the tree line and we started loosing view of it.  i then suggested that we get in the car and go down the street to follow the best we could and possible get better photos.  my wife and daughter were frightened and wanted no part of going.  my son and i jumped into the car but we where separating by the raritan river i couldn't follow the craft directly. as we went west down springfield ave to vally rd. we never caught sight of it again.  i was excited my son was cooly interested my wife and daughter were scared.
content.summary: Look out of my bedroom window and saw object hovering and blinking

content.detailedDescription: I was on the beach after midnight with my friend. we noticed lights in the skies as there were no prominent stars so we found this strange. we noticed there were about 7-8 lights  around eachother and that they were flashing what seemed to be ,blue , red and white.. they could have possibly been rotating and this could cause the flashing lights. we watched them for a while as i had seen a ufo before and knew what it was. they just hovered and some became more prominent while others seemed to disintegrate and dissapear completely.. the numbers started going down but a few remained . they were just hovering around not moving around alot but slighty it was noticable that they were hovering and not completely immobile. then one shot off into the sky
content.summary: I was on the beach, there were no stars, i looked up and saw about 7 flashing lights that were hovering. some seemed to disintigrate while others became more prominent. they hovered around then one shot off into the sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on the patio of the ocotal beach resort restaurant watching the sunset, after the sun went down we sat for a while and at around 20:00 hrs i looked back over to the east toward our condo and a bright reddish orange fuzzy glow appeared over the top of the hill close to the entrance to ocotal beach, my first thought was an aircraft but it lacked navigation light and i could not see any wing structure, it looked to be about 1000 ft asl it continued on a straight course up the center of the bay with absolutely no sound at all, it was doing approximately 100 mph until it reached the middle of the bay then increased in a blink of an eye to jet speed were it went out over the ocean for about a mile or so and then shot up through the clouds at about a 60 degree angle and was gone, liberia airport is close by but this was on no flight path that i have ever seen a plane use inbound or outbound from the airport
content.summary: Bright fuzzy orb no nav. lights straight flight the 60 degree angle up an gone above ocean

content.detailedDescription:
About 10 pm or so.I went out to my garage to have a cigarette. i always look at the night sky. we live out in country & nights are full of stars. when i walked outside looking to the west i saw 3 star like lights in a triangle shape. not moving or making a sound. the lights were much brighter than the other stars so 
i was staring at them for awhile. maybe 5 minutes or so. then all of sudden a light came on to the left of the triangle of lights. it stayed on for several seconds then went out. then another light came on at the right side. was on about the same time as the other light. the 2 outside lights were like headlights shining on me! then without any reason i just walked in the house & sat down to watch tv still don't know why!! a half hour or so i walked back out look again & it was gone. i wasn't frightened & didn't think about taking a photo!! haven't seen anything since.
content.summary: Seen triangle of lights brighter than stars shortly after 2 lights turned on l than r of object

content.detailedDescription:
We were circling the car, when we look through the clouds this trail of smoke or the like, which emphasized enough rest. the sky was quite cloudy with white, and in between this line of brightly colored, highlighted that much compared to white clouds. only saw about two minutes, because we were still circulating with the vehicle until we move in a northerly direction and stop watch. maybe it is the trace of a plane, because the forms are similar, but those that are so bright and varied colors? aircraft or device which is generating this?

in one of the accompanying resolution, bright white spots are observed, but are reflections of the camera through the glass of the car when you place the photo.
content.summary: Trail of smoke through the clouds of various bright colors

content.detailedDescription: i go for a walk every night before bed to look at the sky and around the house. i always look at sky so i seen the object in the north and it moving in weird ways,so i went in to get camera and began to film on a tripod from top of car. i didn't know exactly what it was at first until i zoomed in. it was a orb or round object than moved very slow than fast in weird ways and blinked out and on four times that i counted and pulsated different colors. i felt excited at first then more interested. i just hope that i got good shots of the object so to help identify what it is. i did have a huge triangle fly over me and my wife and daughters in 1994 that made us feel a tingling from head to toe. that is why i always look up as to not to miss anything if i can. the object blinked out the four time and never returned.  i am not good with a computer as how to load pictures or video or files. i am sorry for that but, i do plan to learn so to be more useful to everyone. i do have great video of both nights.
content.summary: I seen a glowing object to the north of my house on 6-13-14 and 6-16-14. two seperate nights and objects.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 3, 2012 it was about 4:07 in the pm and i was walking to my car.  i work at a hospital and on the street there is always alot of traffic.  i was walking toward the first intersection and saw and heard what i thought was a whirlwind and to my surprise there were 4 cube shaped objects in a square formation about 10 feet apart coming up from the ground!!  then there came up a plastic bag looking thing that looked blown up and 4 more cubes came up and then 4 more and then 4 more - a total of 16 cubes and this blown up bag looking thing which i think was leading them.  while this was happening i looked around and there was no one - not a person - not a car - and i'm thinking this is impossible!  i watched it go into the wind (which was quite strong)and up into the atmosphere until i couldn't see it anymore.  once these cubes (which were all silver) were up high the traffic started flowing and people were coming around. the first thing i thought when this happened was - they found me...

then about a week later i was up stairs staring at the beautiful clear starlit night and one star in particular caught my attention and i thought to myself what a beautiful star and then - as if to read my mind - it went from side to side.  i felt as though someone slugged me in the stomach!  i then thought i didn't just see what i thought i saw and it then moved side to side.  i ran down stairs yelling about the ufo to my son and daughter but they want nothing to do with it and so i grabbed my camera and went outside to take pictures and by then it was almost right overhead.  i snapped a bunch of pictures.  they weren't the best but you could see the lights which were green and white.  it was triangle shaped and small about the size of a small plane with 3 lights underneath which were not pulsating at all or blinking.  it went by very slow and silently.  i watched until i couldn't see it anymore.

about a week and a half later at exactly 2:30 i woke up because my room was lit up as though it was day time.  i went to my window and it was so bright i would see what was causing it.  it had to have been very small because my back yard it quite small and big trees.  there is a little space where this object could fit.  the light was shining for about 5 mins.  i was too scared to go outside and look at it.

the next day i went to get my camera and it was gone.  the case was there but the camera was gone.  so, i have no proof of the ufo i saw.  i haven't had anything happen since - that i know of...
content.summary: In 3 1/2 wks i had 3 different experiences.  one with cubes, one with ufo and one with an extremely bright light about 20 ft or less from my window.

content.detailedDescription:
At first myself and my walking partner thought it was a very bright star.  then we noticed it changing colors and moving.  both of us thought it was the weirdest thing we'd ever seen in the sky.

it moved about with no apparent reason alternating the lights.  it was a clear night and various planes and helicopters could be seen in the distance, but not nearly as close as this light giving object.  

it went on for about an hour and i called my folks who saw it from their yard that has a view.  it was very quiet. 

i got an unclear iphone video of it, but it did show the flashing.  with my step dad's binoculars i could clearly see two lights, both the same colors at the same time, but changing to the sequence together.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Alternating lights in same order - blue, white, red, green

content.detailedDescription: I was working and taking pictures of a job site at a local dairy where our company is going to be installing a water line. when i took the photo i thought i saw something quickly go by. i didn't think anything of it at the time. later when i got back to the office and was reviewing the photos i took from my i-phone i saw the object in the photo. what ever it was it was moving very fast because i never really saw it and heard nothing. it was kind of strange when i took the photo i thought i saw something go by while taking the photo viewing through my phone screen and when i looked up nothing was there.
content.summary: Never really saw it. i was taking pictures of a job site and the object was in the photo

content.detailedDescription: on june 28th 2014 around 9:50 to 9:55 pm wile visiting in the back yard i witnessed a bright orange sphere heading north at about 5 to 600ft above ground level at a good rate of speed. there was no sound and the flight path was un varied and true. i watched this object head north and then make a turn to the east maintaining altitude and speed. i watched the object disappear over the houses to the east. conversation with my guest about what we had just seen paste about 30 sec. and out of the same area  another orange object came out of the south sky, same north heading, same altitude and speed but a bit further east by 5 deg. it made a east bound turn as well but a little sooner then the first object. i watched as the second object flew out of sight.
content.summary: Two orange lights north bound

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving on the apache trail road towards tortilla flat. a couple of miles before reaching the saloon at tortilla flat, we noticed a silver disc in the sky on our passenger side. my wife was taking pictures the whole way with her phone (sitting in the passenger seat), so she already had the camera ready to go. we literally took dozens of pictures on our trip, so i not only have this picture but pictures leading up to it and afterword (if they need to be provided in the future as proof). 

the object was hovering in place, and then appeared to start moving. our view was obscured for a split moment after the sighting, and when we could see again, it was no longer there. the disc was highly reflectant, bright silver (like a bare aluminum can), with no lights other than the light reflecting from the sun, which was significant. it had a very large dome in the top center of the craft. we never saw the bottom half of the craft, so the best description i can give is that it was slightly tilted downward so we could see the top part, not the bottom. almost as if the craft was banking a turn, although it didn���t appear to be moving in a curved line. it was too far away to see a great amount of detail, such as windows or panels, but it was close enough that it was right in line with the closest rock formation in the distance. i���d estimate it to be about a half a mile from our vehicle. 

we kept driving and enjoyed the rest of our evening. we saw the craft at about 4 pm, and continued on our way to tortilla flat and canyon lake (and a bit further until the dirt road turns into a single lane road, where we turned around).

on our way back, which was roughly at 5:30, we had just passed tortilla flat, coming back on our way home, in roughly the same place as before, and i witnessed what i'd assume to be the same craft about two thumb-widths to the right of the sun, if your hand is a foot from your face. it seemed to almost be trying to hide in the blinding light of the sun, but was clearly visible to me as the sun was heavily reflecting from it's shiny surface.

the look of the surface of the craft, including its reflectant, shiny metal is why i believe each of the two sightings were of the same craft. the second sighting was a bit humorous to me, as it appeared literally a second or two after i realized where we were on the trail. i remember thinking to myself, i wonder if we���ll see it again, and then there it was right in front of my view. i didn���t mention the second sighting to my wife, and she didn���t see the second sighting. i don���t know why i didn���t say anything, but i felt it was best not to bring it up. i wasn���t afraid of it, but i wasn���t sure how she���d feel if she realized we kept seeing the same craft over and over. looking back i wish i had told her so we could have taken a picture. not that it would have done much good, as again, i don���t think the picture would have come out with it being so close to the sun. still, it would have been nice to have attempted it. each sighting was also in the roughly the same area, and had the same characteristics.

just like the first time, when i saw the craft for the second time, we had to go around a corner for a couple of seconds, which obscured our view. when we got around the corner, the object was gone.

both times the object was hovering, and the first time it seemed like it was just about to move before we lost site of it. it was not a quick darting movement, but it did seem unnatural as it didn't accelerate like a normal aerial craft would. it went from a dead hover to a constant speed before exiting our site.

i did not feel threatened by the craft. i didn���t have an ���anxious��� feeling, or a pit in my stomach. i didn���t feel at any time we were being threatened. thinking back, the only oddity would be that my 2014 jeep wrangler made an audible ���ding��� sound literally right after we saw the craft the first time. i���d say, maybe 5-10 seconds after the sighting. it���s the same ���ding��� as you���d hear if the safety belt wasn���t fastened or the door was open. at the time, i didn���t correlate it with the sighting, but thinking back it is a bit weird, especially since both me and my wife had our seat belts on, and the doors were closed, with no error light on my dashboard.  the only reason i mentioned the year of the vehicle is to show that it is new, and thus probably doesn���t have any mechanical issues. i���ve never heard the jeep before make this sound randomly. again, i don���t know if the two are related, but i figured i���d mention it.

thinking back, it was odd how easy it was to spot each time. again, with the second sighting being quite funny to me when it appeared. despite the fact the second siting was near the sun, it was just.. there. you really couldn���t miss it if you were looking forward down the road. same with the first sighting (if you were looking to your right). despite the fact it disappeared on both occasions, i didn���t feel it was being anything but obvious about its position, and i seriously doubt if we were the only ones who witnessed the craft as it was plainly obvious, and we were not the only ones on the trail.

the only other thing worth noting i guess is that it didn���t feel like anything significant was going on during the time, but the more i think about it now, the more amazing the experience really was. i guess that���s opposite of how i should have felt, instead being shocked at the time of seeing it and then not caring later. but it really didn���t seem that important until we got home and looked at the picture and started talking about it. i���m fine with the idea of ufos; my wife isn���t as much. but both of us felt ���good��� about the experience, if that makes any sense, and i���m glad my wife isn���t walking away from this freaked out. in fact she wants to go back to apache trails again, so i guess it wasn���t a bad experience. 

hope this helped, if you have any questions please let me know and i���ll do my best to provide any more details.
content.summary: {dr|silver disc with dome in the tortilla flat area

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking and took a picture of the communication tower, i didn't see the ufo live only i saw in the photo. it is a dark object on the left side of the tower. the orbs is because of sun, but i can't explain the dark object.

before taking the picture, nothing happened, the only strange thing is that during the tour my fiends and i were talking about ufos and i thought it would be interesting if we saw one right in the communication tower. 

my friends also took pictures of the communications tower but nothing unusual apears at this pictures.
content.summary: I was hiking and took a picture of the communication tower, i didn't see the ufo live only i saw in the photo. it is a dark object on the left side of the tower. the orbs is because of sun, but i can't explain the dark object.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a bright light from rt4 as i was nearing my exit.  made a comment to the driver of the car about what was the light from.  neither of us knew what the light was and assumed it was a plan with its landing light on.   as i got off the highway and moved off the exit ramp, i saw the light again and thought it was the plane we talked about earlier.  i continued to look at it and noticed something weird, it wasn't moving as fast as i thought it should be and it was very low.  it came over my head, about 100 yards above me, i rolled down my window and heard a sound.  it sounded like a blow torch.  it turned back about 120 degrees on a dime but still moving at a slow speed.  it moved about 100 feet and stopped and hovered.  it did this for about 15 seconds then turned facing the tree line, it moved backwards about 10 feet or so, then slowly took off forward towards the tree line.  it took off slow and gained speed.  during this short minute to two minute time frame, the light i was at turned green and i pulled into the gas station across the street and this is pretty much when i saw it go over the tree line.  i was not driving and watch this with my window down the whole time.  we searched for the object after and couldn't locate it.  

i observed what looked like two engines like a jet, shooting flames out towards the ground as a jet would should out to power itself.  these engines were much smaller and much more quite then a jet.  

some of this might be better told then typed.  i have good details on the event.  

what could this have been.  keeping in mind, quonset airbase is near by, and tf green airport is also close by.

this event occurred around 12:40-1 am sunday morning, 6/29/2014.  the time frame is large because it was 1:05 when i got home, i searched for the object after seeing it for a few then drove home.  so i think it was probably about 12:50????Ish
content.summary: Bright light, sharp slow turn, stopped and hovered, moved backwards, took off forward lost as it went past tree line.  searched for it, couldnt see it again

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went out for a glass of wine (at the porche of our apartment), we started chatting when we looked up at the sky..Suddenly i saw this light blinking.

i got really surprised at it because i saw something like that in the past, so we both started discussing what it was (obviously, she thought it was an helicopter or a radio antena blinking).

i explained that we didn't have antenas in that area and that we stared in that direction for months without seeing anything...Plus, the fact that we both noticed the object meant that it was new to our "eyes" or memories of that portion of the sky.

the mos compeling thing that made me grab my video camera, was that the object was blinking changing colors (red, blue, yellow, white, purple) at a very high rate...Not steady like a man made bulb or devise.

i got out my video camera and tried to tape as much as i could...First i started taping from the distance making a reference from a close building to prove it was far, how big it looked like and that i didn't hang nothing in the air to hoax with.

the a started panning and zooming at the object....And although you can't see the colors i mentioned, you can clearly see it's blinking and is kind of rounded.

my wife continued explaining that it was just a star, but i replied that no star blinked like that and was as close as "this thing was" and that i bet her it was going to go away eventually...

searching for more objects....I did see another 2 "star like" objects on the opposite direction. the two of them were behaving and looking like the first one found....But they were smaller and farther away.

after spending almost an hour (and having the video) we both went inside....I came out, before going to bed, and all the objects were gone.

you make whatever you want...I should mention that i'm not a ufo chaser, nor do i have a stack of books from von danieken in my shelve. in fact, i'm a bit suspicious and scheptic at events like this.

my intentions is just to help out to find answers and footage that can make us a little more open minded towards what's out there...

thanks for your attention !

o.T.
(feel free to contact me if you need to...)
content.summary: Wife and i came out of apartment for a glass of wine when i saw the object blinking. there are no towers in that area to confuse with antena lights. dissapeared after 3 hours..

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house and i was drinking water. my mother tell me: run! run! look this object it's red! this was round and red and i was very scared. this object disappeared in 5 second and there was another, red too and disappeared. my mother and me were very scared and we screamed.
content.summary: This object was read and round-trip there was two
